ygData.messageBody:
Heh. I pretty much agree with your cynicism. Hence the subject line
"Probably pointless". :) However, perhaps if enough other players take note
and inform themselves about the issues with bards, this thread won't die
until it gets properly addressed by someone at Verant.

The original Bard Thread has been locked at 385 mostly well-written posts.
There seems to be a new one at
http://boards.station.sony.com/everquest/Forum2/HTML/012233.html Please
post an explanation of what you think hasn't been addressed over the past
year. I suspect that most other players of this great game don't understand
how much bard players have been ignored and how our class keeps getting
broken with new patches yet not fixed or tested or even acknowledged until
months later when Verant declares things to be 'working as intended'. Even
if Verant employees don't read the thread and understand the issues, perhaps
your post will help another player to understand. The more people who
understand what is happening (even if they don't work at Verant) hopefully
Verant will start to realize that it isn't just a typical class whine about
bards but there is a much larger issue that affects all their players.

Thanks again for your ideas and support.

Sincerely,

Aanluil Lumiaria
Erollisi Marr
